snippet: The judge who oversaw the murder trial of former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez has denied his lawyers from further questioning an anonymous tipster under oath who exchanged about 20 letters with the convicted murderer as he awaited t...
lead_paragraph: The judge who oversaw the murder trial of former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez has denied his lawyers from further questioning an anonymous tipster under oath who exchanged about 20 letters with the convicted murderer as he awaited trial.

headline.main: Judge Finds Aaron Hernandez Tipster Not Credible
headline.print_headline: Judge Finds Aaron Hernandez Tipster Not Credible
